item.title: Add or update Bitbucket build status with REST API
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to add or update the build status of a specific commit in Bitbucket using its REST API. It includes a shell script example for updating the build status and provides context on when to use this functionality.
